DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study evaluate efficacy safety intravitreal bevacizumab In retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) . Bevacizumab 0.75 mg 0.03 ml give stage 2+ stage 3+ ROP Zone I Zone II .
